name: bienestar
description: AplicaciÃ³n para ofertar los servicios de Bienestar al Aprendiz

scripts.migrate-seed: npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.undo:all: sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config config/config.json --env production && sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config config/config.json --env production
scripts.migrate-seed:dev: npm run migrate:dev && npm run seed:dev
scripts.undo:all:dev: dotenv -e .env -- sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config config/config.json --env development && dotenv -e .env -- sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config config/config.json --env development && npm run clean:uploads:dev

author: Jeimy Pinto
